title: MRCB Configuration
description: The schema for MRCB configuration validation

backup_dir.description: The directory with export backups would be stored. It is ./backup by default

backup_dir_per_device.description: Defines whether there should be directory per device in 'backup_dir'. True by default

routers.description: List of devices to backup configuration from

name.description: Short name for the device. Used also for per device directory name

hostname.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or IP address for the device
